title: Continuous Finance Building Blocks
description: DApp developers want to use financial Smart Contracts in projects, but that requires Plutus engineering expertise, slowing time-to-market.
solution: A reusable module of bonding curves and SDKs to help developers implement project financing, investment, and collaboration into DApps.
experience: Financial markets software engineering, cryptocurrency payments, start-ups, data & Govtech, impact investing. Organize legal-tech community.
